DOC.detailed_description: The aim prospective , randomize study investigate effect Bulkamid injection woman urinary stress incontinence suitable TVT-procedure suspect ISD compare treatment traditional treatment . The primary endpoint efficacy reduction leakage pad-test 2 month compare pad- test injection . Secondary endpoint patient satisfaction measure 2 12 month use questionnaire number side effect .
